attributes.action: Revoke Article 50 if the EU refuses to extend it
attributes.additional_details:
We are putting people at risk of losing their jobs, risking food & medicine shortages, risking peace & stability in Northern Ireland, air quality could be negatively impacted, and businesses have repeatedly warned leaving without a deal would do irreparable harm to the UK economy.

attributes.background: Leaving the EU without a deal would be disastrous for the country. In order for us to not crash out of the EU without a deal, The Government should immediately revoke Article 50 if the EU refuses to extend it.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the EU has already agreed to extend Article 50. We are therefore not sure what action you would like the UK Government to take.
